live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
40446.summary: Some customers in the Southern area of Barbaree Park in Dawson Creek are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
40446.title: Aug 10 – Dawson Creek (South of Barbaree Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
